test.name: Make sure that is possible to create a Meeting after entering all Scheduler form required fields.
Verify that is possible to remove a Meeting from a Room.
Verify that is possible to update a Meetings data after entering all Scheduler form required fields.
Verify that after clicking on a Meeting from Scheduler Page Timeline, the Meeting's data is retrieved.
Verify that is possible to create a Meeting by using timeline component to set the meeting start time..
Verify that is possible to update a Meeting time period from Timeline Component by clicking on its front/back end and moving it.
